channel.title: Making Full npc.cfg list all npcs will have 50 hp if u want to add it u can
channel.description:
Making full npc list so u can add it if u want all npcs to have 50hp and u can add from there.
And if i dont get feeback within 2 mins after i release it shall be removed.
:cool:

item.title: Making Full npc.cfg list all npcs will have 50 hp if u want to add it u can
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

its not some grand mystery…
were not all gonna be begging you to show us…
for anyone whos wondering:
1.) go to your soarce file
2.) open up npc.cfg
3.) search the name of whatever NPC you want to change
4.) go to the section under “health” and change to 50, or whatever you want.

and for you, dont put topic in the wrong section, and dont put useless topics in the right section

-Will

Read full topic
item.source: Making Full npc.cfg list all npcs will have 50 hp if u want to add it u can
